.then( SeeMySkillset )
.then( SeeMyLinkedIn )
.finally( ContactMe )
    
await SeeMyPortfolio 
await SeeMySkillset
await SeeMyLinkedIn
try { ContactMe }
    
visitors.pipe(
  map( SeeMyPortfolio ),
  map( SeeMySkillset ),
  map( SeeMyLinkedIn ),
).subscribe( ContactMe )
    
Promise.all([
  SeeMyPortfolio ,
  SeeMySkillset ,
  SeeMyLinkedIn ,
]).then( ContactMe )
